## PWM1Gpio type

PWM1 which can be set to use GPIOs 13, 19, 41, 45 and 53. Only 13 is available on the B+/2B/PiZero/3B, on pin 33 See [https://github.com/jgarff/rpi\_ws281x?tab=readme-ov-file\#pwm](https://github.com/jgarff/rpi_ws281x?tab=readme-ov-file#pwm)

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type PWM1Gpio = 13 | 19 | 41 | 45 | 53;
```
